options.content: Note: this dashboard requires Kubecost metrics to be available in your Prometheus deployment. [Learn more](https://github.com/kubecost/cost-model/blob/master/PROMETHEUS.md)

panels.description: Monthly run rate of CPU + GPU costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
)

panels.title: Monthly CPU Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of memory costs based on currently provisioned expenses.
panels.title: Monthly Memory Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached storage and PV costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
(sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Monthly Storage Cost

panels.description: Sum of compute, memory, storage and network costs.

targets.expr:
# Compute
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
) +


# Memory
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
) +

# Storage 

sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
(sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Total Monthly Cost

panels.description: Current CPU use from applications divided by allocatable CPUs

targets.expr:
(
 sum(
   count(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
   * on (instance) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
 ) 
 / 
 (sum (kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", unit="core"}))
) * 100

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Current CPU reservation requests from applications vs allocatable CPU

targets.expr: SUM(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) / SUM(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) * 100

panels.title: CPU Requests

panels.description: Current RAM use vs RAM available

targets.expr: SUM(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace!=""}) / SUM(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) * 100

panels.title: RAM Utilization

panels.description: Current RAM requests vs RAM available

targets.expr:
(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""})
 /
 sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory", unit="byte"})
) * 100

panels.title: RAM Requests

panels.description: This gauge shows the current standard storage use, including cluster storage, vs storage available

targets.expr:
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(pod_pvc_allocation) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
 + sum(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) /
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
 + sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) * 100

panels.title: Storage Utilization

panels.description: Monthly run rate of CPU + GPU costs

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730
)

panels.title: Compute Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of memory costs
panels.title: Memory Cost

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached disk + PV storage costs

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(avg_over_time(pv_hourly_cost[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) * 730 
  * avg(avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
) +
(sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Storage Cost

panels.description: Sum of compute, memory, and storage costs

targets.expr:
# Compute
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
) +


# Memory
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
) +

# Storage 

sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * 730 * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
(sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description: Cost of by resource class of currently provisioned nodes

targets.expr: avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost or up * 0) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)
avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)

# CPU  
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost or up * 0) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
# GPU
avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100) +
# Memory
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 * (1-$useDiscount/100)

panels.title: Monthly Cost by Node

panels.description: Monthly run rate of attached disk + PV storage costs based on currently provisioned resources.

targets.expr:
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730 +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * 730
)

sum(
  avg(avg_over_time(pv_hourly_cost[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) * 730 
  * avg(avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$timeRange] offset 1m)) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
) +
sum(avg(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost
SUM(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device="eth0"}[60m]) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * (60 * 60 * 24 * 30) * $percentEgress * $egressCost

panels.title: Monthly Cost by Resource

targets.expr:
sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (container,namespace, instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace, container)

sum(sum(container_memory_allocation_bytes) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
				node_ram_hourly_cost{} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024
				+ on(node,instance_type) group_left()
					label_replace
					(
						kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
					) * 0
			)
  + 
  sum(container_cpu_allocation) by (namespace,instance) * on(instance) group_left() (
	  			node_cpu_hourly_cost{} + on(node,instance_type) group_left()
		  			label_replace
		  			(
		  				kube_node_labels{}, "instance_type", "$1", "label_node_kubernetes_io_instance_type", "(.*)"
		  			) * 0
		  	)) by (namespace)

list.label: Cost per Gb hour for attached disks
list.name: localStorageGBCost
